Reference

qPackage setup functions

These functions were created to assist data providers with the setup of new qVerse packages

setup_package()

Create a new package in the qData ecosystem

add_author()

Helper function for adding an author to the current package

Processing functions

These functions were created to assist data providers with the processing of data when creating qVerse packages

import_data()

Imports and establishes preparation of raw data

export_data()

Adding datasets to the qPackage

standardise_dates()

Standardises a wide range of date inputs

standardise_titles()

Standardise titles

code_acronym()

Code Acronym for Titles

code_activity()

Code Abbreviations for Activity

code_agreements()

Code Agreement Titles

code_dates()

Creates Numerical IDs from Signature Dates

code_grounds()

Code Treaty Termination Type

code_known_agreements()

Code Known Agreements Abbreviation

code_linkage()

Code Agreement Linkages

code_parties()

Code Agreement Parties

code_term()

Code treaty termination date

code_type()

Code Agreement Type

Other utility functions

Other utility functions that are useful during the creation of a new qPackage

get_package_name()

Get the name of the package

depends()

Loading packages

retain()

Keep objects from the global environment
